extendedInfo.description: A Telnet terminal specifically designed for text based mud games. Can also be used as a general telnet tool.Multiple language support!*1.3.8 Added Command Echo Switch in Settings**1.3.7 Able to change shortcut keys from editor or command inside MUD session. See HELP for details.**1.3.5 fix a text display bug*

reviews.comment: I love it so its 5 stars but it keeps disconnecting for no reason and sometime i cant connnect to some muds, still fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Main screen doesnt support sideways mode and no easy way to adjust the screen limits in game to make sure you got it right

reviews.comment: Definately a great client, but needs command retention!! Also would fall in love if i could use my mudmaster2k scripts, but i will live.

reviews.comment: Awesome term app! Would like to move n s e w etc w/ single key press and shortcuts shouldn\'t auto carriage return. That\'s what ^M is for.

reviews.comment: Works really well! Could use more shortcuts, like infinite of em with scrolling available. Still 5 star rating from me.

reviews.comment: Decent client but it doesnt seem to play nice with rotating my phone (htc incredible) so if i go to portrait mode i lose an entire screen of text
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Solid stable client.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: Overall, i do more MUSH\'es than MUD\'s... I think the program works very well, but with a few major flaws 1) No real logging capability. I like to be able to log what I do for later reference. There is a \'start log\' button, but I cannot find any logs of anything from AndroMud anywhere.  2) the biggest issue. I have an older Android phone.. the LG Ally (upgrading soon). Main issue, is that if I swap to almost anything else net-based... I come back to AndroMud, and I have to force-close because it crashes. I\'m hoping the next phone (with a dual processor) does not have this issue. It\'s a PITA having to keep resetting the app. I don\'t have issues with connectivity for the actual connection. Just the force-close so often. Really a pain!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is better than what I expefted but missing aome things that would be in a pc client. Would really like to see it keep last command sent in prompt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. Just needs a proper wprd-wrapping so it doesn\'t cut off words.

reviews.comment: I love it! Full color MUD access from my phone. A little weird that you can\'t access settings from the connection window menu.

reviews.comment: Perfect if you have a physical keyboard alas I do not anymore please allow portrait mode

reviews.comment: Functional but not very good. Virtual keyboard covers the output window. Can\'t change settings without disconnecting.

reviews.comment: By far the best and most functional telnet client! Beats all other telnet apps.
